scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && tsc && cd ../.. && npm run build:parser && shx mkdir ./packages/cloud/dist/parser && shx cp -r ./packages/parser/dist ./packages/cloud/dist/parser/dist
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage prod
scripts.start:reprocess-anon: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/cloud/src/operations/reprocessAnonHandler.js
scripts.start:reprocess-match: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/cloud/src/operations/reprocessStubHandler.js
scripts.test:refresh-spell-icons: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/cloud/test/test_refresh_spell_icons.js
